## TextElementsRenderer class

Internal class to manage all text rendering.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare class TextElementsRenderer 
```

## Constructors

|  Constructor | Modifiers | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [(constructor)(m\_viewState, m\_viewCamera, m\_viewUpdateCallback, m\_screenCollisions, m\_screenProjector, m\_textCanvasFactory, m\_poiManager, m\_poiRendererFactory, m\_fontCatalogLoader, m\_theme, options)](./harp-mapview.textelementsrenderer._constructor_.md) |  | Create the <code>TextElementsRenderer</code> which selects which labels should be placed on screen as a preprocessing step, which is not done every frame, and also renders the placed \[\[TextElement\]\]s every frame. |

## Methods

|  Method | Modifiers | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [addOverlayText(textElements)](./harp-mapview.textelementsrenderer.addoverlaytext.md) |  | Adds new overlay text elements to this <code>MapView</code>. |
|  [clearOverlayText()](./harp-mapview.textelementsrenderer.clearoverlaytext.md) |  | Adds new overlay text elements to this <code>MapView</code>. |
|  [clearRenderStates()](./harp-mapview.textelementsrenderer.clearrenderstates.md) |  | Reset the current text render states of all visible tiles. All \[\[TextElement\]\]s will fade in after that as if they have just been added. |
|  [getMemoryUsage()](./harp-mapview.textelementsrenderer.getmemoryusage.md) |  | Return memory used by all objects managed by <code>TextElementsRenderer</code>. |
|  [hasOverlayText()](./harp-mapview.textelementsrenderer.hasoverlaytext.md) |  |  |
|  [invalidateCache()](./harp-mapview.textelementsrenderer.invalidatecache.md) |  | Forces update of text elements in the next call to \[\[placeText\]\]. |
|  [movementFinished()](./harp-mapview.textelementsrenderer.movementfinished.md) |  | Notify <code>TextElementsRenderer</code> that the camera has finished its movement. |
|  [movementStarted()](./harp-mapview.textelementsrenderer.movementstarted.md) |  | Notify <code>TextElementsRenderer</code> that the camera has started a movement. |
|  [pickTextElements(screenPosition, pickResults)](./harp-mapview.textelementsrenderer.picktextelements.md) |  | Fill the picking results for the pixel with the given screen coordinate. If multiple \[\[TextElement\]\]s are found, the order of the results is unspecified.<!-- -->Note: \[\[TextElement\]\]s with identical <code>featureId</code> or identical <code>userData</code> will only appear once in the list <code>pickResults</code>. |
|  [placeText(dataSourceTileList, time)](./harp-mapview.textelementsrenderer.placetext.md) |  | Places text elements for the current frame. |
|  [renderText(camera)](./harp-mapview.textelementsrenderer.rendertext.md) |  | Render the text using the specified camera into the current canvas. |
|  [waitInitialized()](./harp-mapview.textelementsrenderer.waitinitialized.md) |  | Waits until initialization is done. |
|  [waitLoaded()](./harp-mapview.textelementsrenderer.waitloaded.md) |  | Waits till all pending resources from any <code>FontCatalog</code> are loaded. |
